resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/Unlock advanced analytics and insights using Microsoft 365 SharePoint datasets')]

properties.description:
Use this template to accelerate sharing security scenarios by identifying information sharing within and outside of an organization. This template extracts Microsoft 365 (Office) SharePoint data via Microsoft Graph Data Connect and aggregates with Azure Active Directory groups to produce analytics-ready data for analysis.

We would love to hear your thoughts on this template. Please send us your ideas and feedback at https://aka.ms/synapse-m365-sharepoint-feedback.

activities.name: AADGroupExpansion
activities.description: Runs a notebook in Synapse Spark Cluster and recursively expands all AADGroups with members.

activities.name: SPGroupExpansion
activities.description: Runs a notebook in Synapse Spark Cluster and recursively expands all  SPGroups members.

activities.name: Sucess
activities.description: this variable is just a placeholder to set result of pipeline as success.

source:
**This Notebook is to expand AAD Groups dataset that is being generated from MGDC**
**Datasets needed: AADGroups, AADGroupOwners and AADGroupMembers**

**_Input_**:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Assuming datasets (AADGroups, AADGroupOwners and AADGroupMembers) are already pulled from MGDC and placed under required location as below  
AADGroups:  https://<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>>.blob.core.windows.net/<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>>/groupdetails/2022/07/26/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/

AADGroupOwners:  https://<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>>.blob.core.windows.net/<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>>/groupowners/2022/07/26/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/

AADGroupMembers:  https://<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>>.blob.core.windows.net/<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>>/groupmembers/2022/07/26/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/

_Note_: Please do change dates , storage account names and RunId (Guid) in the code cell - 2 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**_Output_**:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Data will be outputted into ADLS:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**AAD Owners and Members** - One row per AAD Group Which includes Owners and Members both expanded:  https://<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>>.blob.core.windows.net/<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>>/latest/aadgroupsexpanded/

Ex: GROUP1 -  OWNER1,OWNER2 - MEMBER1,MEMBER2

Ex: GROUP2 -  OWNER21,OWNER22 - MEMBER21,MEMBER22

**AAD Owners - One row per AAD Group & Owner (Expanded) ** : https://<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>>.blob.core.windows.net/<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>>/latest/aadgroupsexpandedonlyowners/

Ex: GROUP1 -  OWNER1

Ex: GROUP1 -  OWNER2

Ex: GROUP2 -  OWNER21

Ex: GROUP2 -  OWNER22

**AAD Members - One row per AAD Group & Member (Expanded)** : https://<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>>.blob.core.windows.net/<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>>/latest/aadgroupsexpandedonlymembers/

Ex: GROUP1 -  MEMBER1

Ex: GROUP1 -  MEMBER2

Ex: GROUP2 -  MEMBER21

Ex: GROUP2 -  MEMBER22
###### **Making sure Spark Context and spark utils are initialized**

%%spark
println("Application Id: " + spark.sparkContext.applicationId )
println("Application Name: " + spark.sparkContext.appName)
###### **Initialize all the incoming parameters.**
###### Note: **Below cell is marked as parameters. Values defined below are defaults and used when nothing is passed as input to notebook.**

val windowStartTime  = "2023-12-11T00:00:00Z"
val windowEndTime = "2023-12-11T00:00:00Z"
val runId  = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
val storageAccountName = "<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>>" // replace with your blob name
val storageContainerName = "<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>>" //replace with your container name
###### **Initialize paths , storage accounts etc..**

import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
import java.time.LocalDateTime
import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter
import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._

val standardDatePattern: String = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'"
val windowStartDateTimeLocal: LocalDateTime =
      LocalDateTime.parse(windowStartTime, DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(standardDatePattern))
val windowEndTimeLocal: LocalDateTime =
      LocalDateTime.parse(windowEndTime, DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(standardDatePattern))


val timeDirFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy/MM/dd")
val yearMonthDayFormat = windowStartDateTimeLocal.format(timeDirFormatter).stripSuffix("/")

val adls_path = f"abfss://$storageContainerName@$storageAccountName.dfs.core.windows.net"

val groupDetailsPath = adls_path + s"/groupdetails/$yearMonthDayFormat/$runId/"
val groupOwnersPath = adls_path + s"/groupowners/$yearMonthDayFormat/$runId/"
val groupMembersPath = adls_path + s"/groupmembers/$yearMonthDayFormat/$runId/"
val latestGroupsPath = adls_path + s"/latest/aadgroupsexpanded/"
val latestGroupsMembersOnlyPath = adls_path + s"/latest/aadgroupsexpandedonlymembers/"
val latestGroupsOwnersOnlyPath = adls_path + s"/latest/aadgroupsexpandedonlyowners/"


spark.conf.set("mapreduce.fileoutputcommitter.marksuccessfuljobs", "false")
// if MSI Access not granted for syanpse workspace to blob then you might need to use below commands to read creds and to set spark conf
//spark.conf.set(s"fs.azure.account.key.${storageAccountName}.blob.core.windows.net",mssparkutils.credentials.getConnectionStringOrCreds("synapseworkspacename-WorkspaceDefaultStorage"))
//spark.conf.set(s"fs.azure.account.key.${storageAccountName}.blob.core.windows.net",mssparkutils.credentials.getConnectionStringOrCreds("LS_ADLSGen2"))
###### Reading Group Details

val inputJsonGroupDetailsDF =
    spark
      .read
      .format("json")
      .option("recursiveFileLookup", "false")
      .load(groupDetailsPath)

val groupDetailsCustom = inputJsonGroupDetailsDF.filter(col("ODataType")==="#microsoft.graph.group")
    .withColumn("GroupId",col("id"))
    .withColumn("GroupDisplayName",col("displayName"))
    .withColumn("Description",col("description"))
    .withColumn("EMail",col("mail"))
    .withColumn("Visibility",col("visibility"))
    .withColumn("SecurityEnabled",col("securityEnabled"))
    .withColumn("MailEnabled",col("mailEnabled"))
    .withColumn("GroupType", when(size($"groupTypes") ===1,col("groupTypes").getItem(0)).otherwise( lit(null)))
    .select("ptenant","GroupId","GroupDisplayName","Description","EMail","Visibility","SecurityEnabled","MailEnabled","GroupType")
###### Reading Group Owners

val inputJsonGroupOwnersDF =
    spark
      .read
      .format("json")
      .option("recursiveFileLookup", "false")        
      .load(groupOwnersPath)
  
  val groupOwnersCustom = inputJsonGroupOwnersDF.filter(col("ODataType")==="#microsoft.graph.user")
    .withColumn("GroupOwnerId",col("id"))
    .withColumn("GroupOwnerDisplayName",col("displayName"))
    .withColumn("GroupOwnerEMail",col("userPrincipalName"))
    .withColumnRenamed("ptenant","GroupOwnerptenant")
    .withColumn("GroupId",regexp_replace(col("pObjectId"),concat(lit("@"),col("GroupOwnerptenant")),lit("")))
    .select("GroupOwnerptenant","GroupId","GroupOwnerId","GroupOwnerDisplayName","GroupOwnerEMail")
###### Reading Group Members

val inputJsonGroupMembersDF =
      spark
      .read
      .format("json")
      .option("recursiveFileLookup", "false")
      .load(groupMembersPath)

val groupMembersCustom = inputJsonGroupMembersDF //.filter(col("ODataType")==="#microsoft.graph.user")
.withColumn("puser",col("id"))
.withColumn("DisplayName",col("displayName"))
.withColumn("EMail",col("userPrincipalName"))
.withColumn("GroupId",regexp_replace(col("pObjectId"),concat(lit("@"),col("ptenant")),lit("")))
.select("ptenant","GroupId","puser","DisplayName","EMail","ODataType")

//Added a join with groupDetailsCustom to derive GroupName
groupDetailsCustom.select("GroupId","GroupDisplayName").join(groupMembersCustom,Seq("GroupId"),"left")
.withColumn("MemberId",col("puser"))
.createOrReplaceTempView("GroupMembersCustom")
###### Recursively Expand All AAD Groups With Members

%%pyspark

## Updated line number 25 to fix the level derivation issue
## Updated line number 18,26,41 to include GroupDisplayName and GroupPath
from pyspark.sql.utils import ParseException, AnalysisException, IllegalArgumentException, QueryExecutionException
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession, DataFrame
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit, when, struct, col, expr
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType, LongType


def recursively_expand_members(dfMembers):
    dfMembersWithLevel = dfMembers.withColumn('level', lit(0))
    
    sql = """
        select this.MemberId
             , this.GroupId as GroupId
             , this.level as level
             , true as tobe_expanded
             , this.ODataType, this.DisplayName, this.EMail, this.ptenant, this.GroupDisplayName, this.GroupPath
          from data this
         where this.ODataType = '#microsoft.graph.user' 
           and GroupId != MemberId
         union 
        select next.MemberId MemberId
             , this.GroupId as GroupId
             , this.level + 1 + next.level as level
             , next.ODataType = '#microsoft.graph.group' as tobe_expanded
             , next.ODataType, next.DisplayName, next.EMail, next.ptenant, this.GroupDisplayName, CONCAT(this.GroupPath,"->",next.GroupPath) AS GroupPath
          from data this
          join data next
            on this.MemberId = next.GroupId
           and this.ptenant = next.ptenant
         where this.ODataType = '#microsoft.graph.group'
           
    """
    find_next = True
    current_level = 0
    total_levels_to_use = 6
    while find_next and current_level < total_levels_to_use:
        print(f"Current level: {current_level}")
        dfMembersWithLevel.filter("GroupId != MemberId ").createOrReplaceTempView("data")
        dfMembersWithLevel = spark.sql(sql)
        find_next = dfMembersWithLevel.selectExpr("ANY(tobe_expanded = True and ODataType = '#microsoft.graph.group')").collect()[0][0]
        current_level +=1 
        
    return dfMembersWithLevel.drop('tobe_expanded')

dfGroupMembersCustom = spark.sql('select GroupId,MemberId,ODataType,DisplayName,EMail,ptenant,GroupDisplayName, GroupDisplayName AS GroupPath  from GroupMembersCustom')
result = recursively_expand_members(dfGroupMembersCustom)
groupMembersCustomExpanded = result.filter("GroupId != MemberId ").withColumnRenamed(
    'DisplayName','MemberDisplayName').withColumnRenamed('EMail','MemberEMail').withColumnRenamed('ptenant','Memberptenant').withColumnRenamed('Level','MemberLevel').withColumn('MemberType',lit('User'))

groupMembersCustomExpanded.createOrReplaceTempView("groupMembersCustomExpanded")
###### Merge AAD Groups to Owners and preparing final dataset to output

val dfFinalGroupsWithOnlyOwnersNormalized=groupDetailsCustom.join(groupOwnersCustom,Seq("GroupId"),"left")
    .withColumn("Owners", struct(  col("GroupOwnerId").alias("puser")
                                            ,col("GroupOwnerDisplayName").alias("DisplayName")
                                            ,col("GroupOwnerEMail").alias("EMail")
                                            ,col("GroupOwnerptenant").alias("ptenant")
                                            ,(when(col("GroupOwnerId").isNull,lit(null).cast(LongType)).otherwise(lit(-1).cast(LongType))).alias("Level")
                                            ,(when(col("GroupOwnerId").isNull,lit(null).cast(StringType)).otherwise(lit("User").cast(StringType))).alias("Type")
                                          )
                )

val groupMembersCustomExpanded = spark.sql("select DISTINCT GroupId,MemberId,MemberDisplayName,MemberEMail,Memberptenant,MemberLevel,MemberType from groupMembersCustomExpanded ")
val dfFinalGroupsWithOnlyMembersNormalized= groupDetailsCustom.join(groupMembersCustomExpanded,Seq("GroupId"),"left")
    .withColumn("Members", struct(  col("MemberId").alias("puser")
                                            ,col("MemberDisplayName").alias("DisplayName")
                                            ,col("MemberEMail").alias("EMail")                                            
                                            ,col("Memberptenant").alias("ptenant")
                                            ,col("MemberLevel").alias("Level")
                                            ,col("MemberType").alias("Type")
                                          )
              ).sort("GroupId","MemberLevel","MemberDisplayName")

val dfFinalGroups = groupDetailsCustom
                                .join(dfFinalGroupsWithOnlyOwnersNormalized.groupBy("GroupId").agg(collect_set(col("Owners")).alias("Owners")),Seq("GroupId"),"left")
                                .join(dfFinalGroupsWithOnlyMembersNormalized.groupBy("GroupId").agg(collect_set(col("Members")).alias("Members")),Seq("GroupId"),"left")
###### Writing final dataset to latest location

dfFinalGroups
    .repartition(1)
    .write
    .format("json")
    .mode("overwrite")
    .save(latestGroupsPath)

dfFinalGroupsWithOnlyOwnersNormalized
    .drop("Owners")
    .repartition(1)
    .write
    .format("json")
    .mode("overwrite")
    .save(latestGroupsOwnersOnlyPath)    
    
dfFinalGroupsWithOnlyMembersNormalized
    .drop("Members")
    .repartition(1)
    .write
    .format("json")
    .mode("overwrite")
    .save(latestGroupsMembersOnlyPath)

structure.name: ptenant
structure.description: The Tenant ID

structure.name: SiteId
structure.description: GUID of the site

structure.name: WebId
structure.description: The WebId of the shared item

structure.name: ListId
structure.description: The listid

structure.name: ItemType
structure.description: The type of the item

structure.name: ItemURL
structure.description: The URL of the item

structure.name: FileExtension
structure.description: The extension of the item

structure.name: RoleDefinition
structure.description: The role assigned

structure.name: LinkId
structure.description: The LinkId being shared

structure.name: ScopeId
structure.description: The Scope Id

structure.name: LinkScope
structure.description: The scope of the Link

structure.name: SharedWithCount
structure.description: The shared count of the item. Format: ARRAY<STRUCT<`Type`:STRING, `Count`:STRING>>

structure.name: SharedWith
structure.description: The shared with details of the item. Format: ARRAY<STRUCT<`Type`:STRING, `Name`:STRING, `Email`:STRING>>

structure.name: Operation
structure.description: Extraction mode of this row. Gives info about row extracted with full mode ('Full') or delta mode ('Created', 'Updated' or 'Deleted')

structure.name: SnapshotDate
structure.description: The date and time when the snapshot of the entry is taken

structure.name: ShareCreatedBy
structure.description: Gives information about the user/group that created the share. Format: <STRUCT<`Type`:STRING, `Name`:STRING, `Email`:STRING>

structure.name: ShareCreatedTime
structure.description: The date and time when the share link was created

structure.name: ShareLastModifiedBy
structure.description: Gives information about the user/group that last modified the share. Format: <STRUCT<`Type`:STRING, `Name`:STRING, `Email`:STRING>

structure.name: ShareLastModifiedTime
structure.description: The date and time when the share was last modified

structure.name: ShareExpirationTime
structure.description: The date and time when the share link could expires

structure.name: ptenant
structure.description: The Tenant ID

structure.name: Id
structure.description: GUID of the site

structure.name: Url
structure.description: URL for the site

structure.name: RootWeb
structure.description: Root web information for the site. Format: STRUCT<`Id`:STRING, `Title`:STRING, `WebTemplate`:STRING, `WebTemplateId`:INTEGER, `LastItemModifiedDate`:DATETIME>

structure.name: WebCount
structure.description: Number of webs (subsites) in the site

structure.name: StorageQuota
structure.description: Total storage in bytes allowed for this site

structure.name: StorageUsed
structure.description: Total storage in bytes used by this site (includes main file stream, file metadata, versions and recycle bin)

structure.name: StorageMetrics
structure.description: Storage metrics for the site. Format: STRUCT<`MetadataSize`:INT64, `TotalFileCount`:INT64, `TotalFileStreamSize`:INT64, `TotalSize`:INT64>

structure.name: GroupId
structure.description: Id of the group associated with this site

structure.name: GeoLocation
structure.description: Geographic region where the data is stored

structure.name: IsInRecycleBin
structure.description: Indicates that the site has been deleted and is in the recycle bin

structure.name: IsTeamsConnectedSite
structure.description: Indicates that the site is connected to Teams

structure.name: IsTeamsChannelSite
structure.description: Indicates that the site is a channel site

structure.name: TeamsChannelType
structure.description: Type of channel, if isTeamsChannelSite is true

structure.name: IsHubSite
structure.description: Indicates that the site is associated with a hub site

structure.name: HubSiteId
structure.description: Id of the hub site for this site, if IsHubSite is true

structure.name: BlockAccessFromUnmanagedDevices
structure.description: Site is configured to block access from unmanaged devices

structure.name: BlockDownloadOfAllFilesOnUnmanagedDevices
structure.description: Site is configured to block download of all files from unmanaged devices

structure.name: BlockDownloadOfViewableFilesOnUnmanagedDevices
structure.description: Site is configured to block download of viewable files from unmanaged devices

structure.name: ShareByEmailEnabled
structure.description: Site is configured to enable share by e-mail

structure.name: ShareByLinkEnabled
structure.description: Site is configured to enable share by link

structure.name: SensitivityLabelInfo
structure.description: Sensitivity Label for the site. Format: STRUCT<`DisplayName`:STRING, `Id`:STRING>

structure.name: Classification
structure.description: Classification of the site

structure.name: IBMode
structure.description: Information Barriers Mode: Open, Owner Moderated, Implicit, Explicit, Inferred

structure.name: IBSegments
structure.description: List of organization segments if IB mode is Explicit

structure.name: Owner
structure.description: Owner of the site. Format: STRUCT<`AadObjectId`:STRING,`Email`:STRING,`Name`:STRING>

structure.name: SecondaryContact
structure.description: Secondary contact for the site. Format: STRUCT<`AadObjectId`:STRING,`Email`:STRING,`Name`:STRING>

structure.name: ReadLocked
structure.description: Whether the site is locked for read access. If true, no users or administrators will be able to access the site

structure.name: ReadOnly
structure.description: Whether the site is in read-only mode

structure.name: CreatedTime
structure.description: When the site was created (in UTC)

structure.name: LastSecurityModifiedDate
structure.description: When security on the site was last changed (in UTC)

structure.name: Operation
structure.description: Extraction mode of this row. Gives info about row extracted with full mode ('Full') or delta mode ('Created', 'Updated' or 'Deleted')

structure.name: SnapshotDate
structure.description: When this site information was captured (in UTC)

structure.name: ptenant
structure.description: Id of the tenant

structure.name: SiteId
structure.description: Id of the site where the group resides

structure.name: GroupId
structure.description: Id of the group, unique within SPSite

structure.name: GroupLinkId
structure.description: Id of the sharing link associated with this group, if it was created for a sharing link. The id is all zeros if the group is not related to a sharing link

structure.name: GroupType
structure.description: Type: SharePointGroup

structure.name: DisplayName
structure.description: Name of the group

structure.name: Description
structure.description: Description of the group

structure.name: Owner
structure.description: Group owner. Format: STRUCT<`AadObjectId`:STRING,`Name`:STRING,`Email`:STRING>

structure.name: Members
structure.description: Members of the group. Format: ARRAY<STRUCT<`Type`:STRING, `AadObjectId`:STRING, `Name`:STRING, `Email`:STRING>>

structure.name: Operation
structure.description: Extraction mode of this row. Gives info about row extracted with full mode ('Full') or delta mode ('Created', 'Updated' or 'Deleted')

structure.name: SnapshotDate
structure.description: Date this data set was generated

source:
**This Notebook is to expand SP Groups dataset that is being generated from MGDC**
**Datasets needed: SPGroups**

**_Input_**:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Assuming datasets (SPGroups) are already pulled from MGDC and placed under required location as below  
SPGroups:  https://<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>.blob.core.windows.net/<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>/spgroups/2022/07/26/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/

Assuming below AADGroupMembers is generated dataset and expanded with members. 
Below dataset is not same as extracted from MGDC. Please follow AADGroupExpansion Notebook to generate below dataset.
Expanded AADGroupMembers:  https://<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>.blob.core.windows.net/<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>/latest/aadgroupsexpandedonlymembers/

_Note_: Please do change dates , storage account names and RunId (Guid) in the code cell - 2 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**_Output_**:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Data will be outputted into ADLS:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**SPGroup Owners and Members** - One row per SP Group Which includes Owners and Members both expanded:  https://<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>.blob.core.windows.net/<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>/latest/spgroupsexpanded/

Ex: GROUP1 -  OWNER1,OWNER2 - MEMBER1,MEMBER2

Ex: GROUP2 -  OWNER21,OWNER22 - MEMBER21,MEMBER22

**SPGroup Owners - One row per SP Group & Owner (Expanded) ** : https://<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>.blob.core.windows.net/<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>/latest/spgroupsexpandedonlyowners/

Ex: GROUP1 -  OWNER1

Ex: GROUP1 -  OWNER2

Ex: GROUP2 -  OWNER21

Ex: GROUP2 -  OWNER22

**SPGroup Members - One row per SP Group & Member (Expanded)** : https://<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>.blob.core.windows.net/<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>/latest/spgroupsexpandedonlymembers/

Ex: GROUP1 -  MEMBER1

Ex: GROUP1 -  MEMBER2

Ex: GROUP2 -  MEMBER21

Ex: GROUP2 -  MEMBER22
###### **Making sure Spark Context and spark utils are initialized**

%%spark
println("Application Id: " + spark.sparkContext.applicationId )
println("Application Name: " + spark.sparkContext.appName)
###### **Initialize all the incoming parameters**

val windowStartTime  = "2022-08-31T00:00:00Z"
val windowEndTime = "2022-08-31T00:00:00Z"
val runId  = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
val storageAccountName = "<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountName>>" // replace with your blob name
val storageContainerName = "<<PipelineParameters:FillStorageAccountContainerName>>" //replace with your container name
###### **Initialize paths , storage accounts etc..**

import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
import java.time.LocalDateTime
import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter
import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql.{DataFrame, Row, SparkSession}

val standardDatePattern: String = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'"
val windowStartDateTimeLocal: LocalDateTime =
      LocalDateTime.parse(windowStartTime, DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(standardDatePattern))
val windowEndTimeLocal: LocalDateTime =
      LocalDateTime.parse(windowEndTime, DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(standardDatePattern))

// set your storage account connection

val timeDirFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy/MM/dd")
val yearMonthDayFormat = windowStartDateTimeLocal.format(timeDirFormatter).stripSuffix("/")

val adls_path = f"abfss://$storageContainerName@$storageAccountName.dfs.core.windows.net"

val spgroupsPath = adls_path + s"/spgroups/$yearMonthDayFormat/$runId/"
val sitesPath = adls_path + s"/sites/$yearMonthDayFormat/$runId/"
val sharingPath = adls_path + s"/sharing/$yearMonthDayFormat/$runId/"

val latestSPGroupsPath = adls_path + s"/latest/spgroupsexpanded/"
val latestSPGroupsOwnersOnlyPath = adls_path + s"/latest/spgroupsexpandedonlyowners/"
val latestSPGroupsMembersOnlyPath = adls_path + s"/latest/spgroupsexpandedonlymembers/"

val latestGroupsMembersOnlyPath = adls_path + s"/latest/aadgroupsexpandedonlymembers/"
val latestGroupsOwnersOnlyPath = adls_path + s"/latest/aadgroupsexpandedonlyowners/"

val latestSitesPath = adls_path + s"/latest/sites/"
val latestSharingPath = adls_path + s"/latest/sharing/"

spark.conf.set("mapreduce.fileoutputcommitter.marksuccessfuljobs", "false")
// if MSI Access not granted for syanpse workspace to blob then you might need to use below commands to read creds and to set spark conf
//spark.conf.set(s"fs.azure.account.key.${storageAccountName}.blob.core.windows.net",mssparkutils.credentials.getConnectionStringOrCreds("synapseworkspacename-WorkspaceDefaultStorage"))
//spark.conf.set(s"fs.azure.account.key.${storageAccountName}.blob.core.windows.net",mssparkutils.credentials.getConnectionStringOrCreds("LS_ADLSGen2"))
###### Reading Expanded AAD Groups with Members

val expandedAADGroupMembersDF =
    spark
      .read
      .format("json")
      .option("recursiveFileLookup", "false")
      .load(latestGroupsMembersOnlyPath)
###### Reading Expanded AAD Owners as Members

val expandedAADGroupOwnersDF =
    spark
      .read
      .format("json")
      .option("recursiveFileLookup", "false")
      .load(latestGroupsOwnersOnlyPath)
      .withColumn("MemberId",col("GroupOwnerId"))
      .withColumn("MemberDisplayName",col("GroupOwnerDisplayName"))
      .withColumn("MemberEMail",col("GroupOwnerEMail"))
      .withColumn("Memberptenant",col("GroupOwnerptenant"))
      .withColumn("MemberLevel",lit(0))
      .withColumn("MemberType",lit("User"))
###### Reading SPGroup Details

val aadUserStruct =
   StructType(Array(
                    StructField("AadObjectId", StringType, true),
                    StructField("Email", StringType, false),
                    StructField("Name", StringType, false),
                    StructField("Type", StringType, false)
                    )
            )
val schemaSPGroups = 
                StructType( Array(
                                    StructField("ptenant", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("SiteId", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("GroupId", LongType,true),
                                    StructField("GroupLinkId", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("GroupType", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("DisplayName", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("Description", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("Owner", aadUserStruct,true),
                                    StructField("Members", ArrayType(aadUserStruct),true),              
                                    StructField("Operation", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("SnapshotDate", StringType,true)
                                    )
                            )

val inputJsonSPGroupsDF =
    spark
      .read
      .schema(schemaSPGroups)
      .format("json")
      .option("recursiveFileLookup", "false")
      .load(spgroupsPath)


val spgroupsCustom = inputJsonSPGroupsDF
    .withColumnRenamed("DisplayName","GroupDisplayName")
    .withColumn("EMail",lit(null))
    .withColumn("Visibility",lit(null))
    .withColumn("SecurityEnabled",lit(null))
    .withColumn("MailEnabled",lit(null))
    .withColumn("GroupType",lit("SharePointGroup"))
    .select("ptenant","SiteId","GroupId","GroupDisplayName","Description","EMail","Visibility","SecurityEnabled","MailEnabled","GroupType","GroupLinkId","Owner","Members")
###### Expanding SG's in SPGroup Members from AAD Mmebers
###### Step 1: Get Non SG Users as members as-is

// Updated code for expanding SPGroup members

val spgroupsWithMembersNormalized = spgroupsCustom
                                        .withColumn("Members",explode_outer(col("Members")))
                                        .withColumn("MemberType",col("Members.Type"))                                                      
                                        .withColumn("MemberId",col("Members.AadObjectId"))                                                      
                                        .withColumn("MemberDisplayName",col("Members.Name"))                                                      
                                        .withColumn("MemberEMail",col("Members.Email"))  
                                        .withColumn("MemberLevel",lit(0))
                                        .withColumn("Memberptenant",col("ptenant"))
                                        .drop("Members","Owner")     


val spGroupsNonSGS = spgroupsWithMembersNormalized.filter("MemberType != 'SecurityGroup' or MemberId is null ")

                                         
val spGroupsNonSGSFinalWithMembers = spGroupsNonSGS.withColumn("Members", struct(col("MemberId").alias("puser")
                                                                                ,col("MemberDisplayName").alias("DisplayName")
                                                                                ,col("MemberEMail").alias("EMail")                                            
                                                                                ,col("Memberptenant").alias("ptenant")
                                                                                ,(col("MemberLevel").cast(LongType) + lit(1)).alias("Level")
                                                                                ,col("MemberType").alias("Type")                                                                    
                                                                                )
                                                                )

                                           
                                        .select("ptenant","SiteId","GroupId","GroupDisplayName","Description"
                                                ,"Email","Visibility","SecurityEnabled","MailEnabled","GroupType","GroupLinkId"
                                                ,"MemberId","MemberDisplayName","MemberEMail","Memberptenant","MemberLevel","MemberType"
                                                ,"Members"
###### Step 2: Get SGs and Members but exclude memebers in owner groups with same name

val spGroupsSGS_ExceptOwnerGroups = spgroupsWithMembersNormalized.filter(" (MemberType == 'SecurityGroup' and MemberId is not null and GroupId != 3) or (MemberType == 'SecurityGroup' and MemberId is not null and GroupId == 3 and GroupDisplayName != MemberDisplayName  )   ")
val spGroupsSGSWithAADMembers_ExceptOwnerGroups = spGroupsSGS_ExceptOwnerGroups.as("a")
                                    .join(expandedAADGroupMembersDF.as("b"),spGroupsSGS_ExceptOwnerGroups("MemberId")===expandedAADGroupMembersDF("GroupId"),"left")
                                     .select( col("a.ptenant"),col("a.SiteId"),col("a.GroupId"),col("a.GroupDisplayName"),col("a.Description")
                                             ,col("a.Email"),col("a.Visibility"),col("a.SecurityEnabled"),col("a.MailEnabled"),col("a.GroupType"),col("GroupLinkId")
                                             ,col("b.MemberId"),col("b.MemberDisplayName"),col("b.MemberEMail"),col("b.Memberptenant") ,col("b.MemberLevel"),col("b.MemberType")
                                             ,struct(    col("b.MemberId").alias("puser")
                                                        ,col("b.MemberDisplayName").alias("DisplayName")
                                                        ,col("b.MemberEMail").alias("EMail")                                            
                                                        ,col("b.Memberptenant").alias("ptenant")
                                                        ,(col("b.MemberLevel").cast(LongType) + lit(1)).alias("Level")
                                                        ,col("b.MemberType").alias("Type")                                                                    
                                                    ).as("Members")
###### Step 3: Get owners of share point groups in case group id 3 represents site owners group

val spGroupsSGS_OwnerGroups = spgroupsWithMembersNormalized.filter(" (MemberType == 'SecurityGroup' and MemberId is not null and GroupId == 3 and GroupDisplayName == MemberDisplayName  )   ")


val spGroupsSGSWithAADMembers_OwnerGroups = spGroupsSGS_OwnerGroups.as("a")
                                    .join(expandedAADGroupOwnersDF.as("b"),spGroupsSGS_OwnerGroups("MemberId")===expandedAADGroupOwnersDF("GroupId"),"left")
                                     .select( col("a.ptenant"),col("a.SiteId"),col("a.GroupId"),col("a.GroupDisplayName"),col("a.Description")
                                             ,col("a.Email"),col("a.Visibility"),col("a.SecurityEnabled"),col("a.MailEnabled"),col("a.GroupType"),col("GroupLinkId")
                                             ,col("b.MemberId"),col("b.MemberDisplayName"),col("b.MemberEMail"),col("b.Memberptenant") ,col("b.MemberLevel"),col("b.MemberType")
                                             ,struct(    col("b.MemberId").alias("puser")
                                                        ,col("b.MemberDisplayName").alias("DisplayName")
                                                        ,col("b.MemberEMail").alias("EMail")                                            
                                                        ,col("b.Memberptenant").alias("ptenant")
                                                        ,(col("b.MemberLevel").cast(LongType) + lit(1)).alias("Level")
                                                        ,col("b.MemberType").alias("Type")                                                                    
                                                    ).as("Members")
                                            )
###### Step 4: Combining all the expanded members /owner or sharepoint groups

val spGroupsMembersExpanded= spGroupsNonSGSFinalWithMembers.unionByName(spGroupsSGSWithAADMembers_ExceptOwnerGroups).unionByName(spGroupsSGSWithAADMembers_OwnerGroups).dropDuplicates()

val spGroupsMembersExpandedAgg= spGroupsMembersExpanded.groupBy("ptenant","SiteId","GroupId","GroupDisplayName","Description","Email","Visibility","SecurityEnabled","MailEnabled","GroupType","GroupLinkId").agg(collect_set(col("Members")).alias("Members"))
###### Expanding SG's in SPGroup Owners from SPGroup Members / AAD Mmebers

val spgroupsWithSPGroupTypeOwners = spgroupsCustom.filter(col("Owner.Type") === "SharePointGroup")
                                                  .select(col("ptenant"),col("SiteId"),col("GroupId"),col("Owner.Name").alias("OwnerName"),col("Owner.Type").alias("OwnerType") 
                                                    ,col("GroupDisplayName"),col("Description"),col("Email"),col("Visibility"),col("SecurityEnabled"),col("MailEnabled"),col("GroupType"),col("GroupLinkId")
                                                   )
                                                  .alias("a").join(spGroupsMembersExpanded.alias("b"),List("ptenant","SiteId","GroupId"))
                                                  .select( col("a.ptenant"),col("a.SiteId"),col("a.GroupId"),col("b.Members").alias("Owners")
                                                          ,col("a.GroupDisplayName"),col("a.Description"),col("a.Email"),col("a.Visibility"),col("a.SecurityEnabled"),col("a.MailEnabled"),col("a.GroupType"),col("a.GroupLinkId")
                                                          ,col("b.MemberId").alias("GroupOwnerId"),col("b.MemberDisplayName").alias("GroupOwnerDisplayName"),col("b.MemberEmail").alias("GroupOwnerEMail"),col("b.Memberptenant").alias("GroupOwnerptenant") 
                                                   )
                                                  .withColumn("ds",lit(1)) 

val spgroupsWithSecurityTypeOwners = (spgroupsCustom.filter(col("Owner.Type") === "SecurityGroup" and col("Owner.AadObjectId").isNotNull )
                                                     .select(col("ptenant"),col("SiteId"),col("GroupId"),col("Owner.Name").alias("OwnerName"),col("Owner.Type").alias("OwnerType"),col("Owner.AadObjectId").alias("OwnerAadObjectId")  
                                                     ,col("GroupDisplayName"),col("Description"),col("Email"),col("Visibility"),col("SecurityEnabled"),col("MailEnabled"),col("GroupType"),col("GroupLinkId")
                                                     )
                                        ).alias("a") 
                                        .join(expandedAADGroupMembersDF.alias("b"),col("a.OwnerAadObjectId") === col("b.GroupId") )
                                        .select(col("a.ptenant")
                                                ,col("a.SiteId")
                                                ,col("a.GroupId")
                                                ,struct(  col("b.MemberId").alias("puser")
                                                                    ,col("b.MemberDisplayName").alias("DisplayName")
                                                                    ,col("b.MemberEmail").alias("EMail")                                            
                                                                    ,col("b.Memberptenant").alias("ptenant")
                                                                    ,(col("b.MemberLevel").cast(LongType) + lit(1)).alias("Level")
                                                                    ,col("b.MemberType").alias("Type")                                                                    
                                                        ).as("Owners")
                                                ,col("a.GroupDisplayName"),col("a.Description"),col("a.Email"),col("a.Visibility"),col("a.SecurityEnabled"),col("a.MailEnabled"),col("a.GroupType"),col("a.GroupLinkId")
                                                ,col("b.MemberId").alias("GroupOwnerId"),col("b.MemberDisplayName").alias("GroupOwnerDisplayName"),col("b.MemberEmail").alias("GroupOwnerEMail"),col("b.Memberptenant").alias("GroupOwnerptenant")          
                                                )
                                                .withColumn("ds",lit(2)) 
                                     

val spGroupsWithMembersExpandedForAADAndSPGroupTypes = spgroupsWithSPGroupTypeOwners.unionByName(spgroupsWithSecurityTypeOwners)

val spgroupsWithMiscTypeOwners = spgroupsCustom.withColumn("ds",lit(3)).alias("a").join(spGroupsWithMembersExpandedForAADAndSPGroupTypes.alias("b"),List("ptenant","SiteId","GroupId"),"leftanti")
                                                .select( col("a.ptenant"),col("a.SiteId"),col("a.GroupId")
                                                        ,struct(  col("a.Owner.AadObjectId").alias("puser")
                                                                            ,col("a.Owner.Name").alias("DisplayName")
                                                                            ,col("a.Owner.Email").alias("EMail")                                            
                                                                            ,col("a.ptenant").alias("ptenant")
                                                                            ,lit(-1).alias("Level")
                                                                            ,col("a.Owner.Type").alias("Type")                                                                    
                                                                ).as("Owners") 
                                                            ,col("a.GroupDisplayName"),col("a.Description"),col("a.Email"),col("a.Visibility"),col("a.SecurityEnabled"),col("a.MailEnabled"),col("a.GroupType"),col("a.GroupLinkId")                                                                
                                                            ,col("a.Owner.AadObjectId").alias("GroupOwnerId"),col("a.Owner.Name").alias("GroupOwnerDisplayName"),col("a.Owner.Email").alias("GroupOwnerEMail"),col("a.ptenant").alias("GroupOwnerptenant")        
                                                        ,col("ds")
                                                        )
                                               

val spGroupsOwnersExpanded = spGroupsWithMembersExpandedForAADAndSPGroupTypes.unionByName(spgroupsWithMiscTypeOwners).dropDuplicates()
val spGroupsOwnersExpandedAgg= spGroupsOwnersExpanded.groupBy("ptenant","SiteId","GroupId","GroupDisplayName","Description","Email","Visibility","SecurityEnabled","MailEnabled","GroupType","GroupLinkId")
                                                        .agg(collect_set(col("Owners")).alias("Owners"))
###### Merge SP Groups to SP Owners and preparing final dataset to output

val spGroupOwnersAndMembersAgg =spGroupsMembersExpandedAgg.join(spGroupsOwnersExpandedAgg,List("ptenant","SiteId","GroupId")).select (spGroupsMembersExpandedAgg("*"),spGroupsOwnersExpandedAgg("Owners"))
###### Writing final dataset to latest location

spGroupOwnersAndMembersAgg
    .repartition(1)
    .write
    .format("json")
    .mode("overwrite")
    .save(latestSPGroupsPath)

spGroupsOwnersExpanded
    .drop("Owners")
    .repartition(1)
    .write
    .format("json")
    .mode("overwrite")
    .save(latestSPGroupsOwnersOnlyPath)    
    
spGroupsMembersExpanded
    .drop("Members")
    .repartition(1)
    .write
    .format("json")
    .mode("overwrite")
    .save(latestSPGroupsMembersOnlyPath)
######  Writing Sharing dataset to latest folder location

val userStruct =
   StructType(Array(
                    StructField("AadObjectId", StringType, true),
                    StructField("Email", StringType, false),
                    StructField("Name", StringType, false),
                    StructField("Type", StringType, false)
                    )
            )

val sharingCount =
   StructType(Array(
                    StructField("Type", StringType, false),
                    StructField("Count", LongType, false)
                    )
            )

val schemaSharing = 
                StructType( Array(
                                    StructField("ptenant", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("SiteId", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("WebId", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("ListId", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("ItemType", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("ItemURL", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("FileExtension", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("RoleDefinition", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("LinkId", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("ScopeId", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("LinkScope", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("SharedWithCount", ArrayType(sharingCount),true),
                                    StructField("SharedWith", ArrayType(userStruct),true),
                                    StructField("Operation", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("SnapshotDate", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("ShareCreatedBy", userStruct,true),
                                    StructField("ShareCreatedTime", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("ShareLastModifiedBy", userStruct,true),
                                    StructField("ShareLastModifiedTime", StringType,true),
                                    StructField("ShareExpirationTime", StringType,true)       
                                )
                            )

val inputJsonSharingDF =
    spark
      .read
      .schema(schemaSharing)
      .format("json")
      .option("recursiveFileLookup", "false")
      .load(sharingPath)

inputJsonSharingDF
    .write
    .format("json")
    .mode("overwrite")
    .save(latestSharingPath)
######  Writing Sites dataset to latest folder location

val inputJsonSitesDF =
    spark
      .read
      .format("json")
      .option("recursiveFileLookup", "false")
      .load(sitesPath)

inputJsonSitesDF
    .write
    .format("json")
    .mode("overwrite")
    .save(latestSitesPath)
